product_name: Patagonia Tin Shed Rider Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Functional as well as stylish, the women's Patagonia Tin Shed Rider Boots are classic double-buckle leather boots with a full medial zipper for easy entry and exit. Durable leather uppers resist drizzle and sleet; moisture-wicking lining adds comfort. Supportive 70% recycled-polyurethane footbed is lined with pigskin for comfort. Internal EVA padding in weight-bearing areas add comfort and superior flexibility. Polyurethane comfort chamber provides support on hard surfaces and natural thermal protection in cold climates. Vibram(R) rubber soles with 4mm lugs are designed for grip and durability on slick and varied surfaces; heels measure 3cm in height. The women's Patagonia Tin Shed Rider Boots are especially designed to be resoled locally for extended life. Closeout.
short_description: Functional as well as stylish, the women's Patagonia Tin Shed Rider Boots are classic double-buckle leather boots with a full medial zipper for easy entry and exit.
